issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: Signifies completion of tasks, info requests, etc.
resolution.name: Completed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
The following harmless error is logged when ELB checks for existence of an IAM role policy for a load balancer:

{code}
Fri Oct 11 14:31:06 2013 ERROR [EucalyptusActivityTasks$EucalyptusActivityTask:Eucalyptus.bootstrap:AbstractListenableFuture.class java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker#374] [com.eucalyptus.loadbalancing.activities.EucalyptusActivityTasks$EucalyptusActivityTask.dispatchFailure(EucalyptusActivityTasks.java):2374] Loadbalancer activity error
com.eucalyptus.context.ServiceDispatchException: Failed to send message GetRolePolicyType to service EuareInternal because: Component that caused exception is: DefaultJavaComponent{EuareInternal.component}. Message payload is of type: GetRolePolicyType
        at com.eucalyptus.context.ServiceContext.send(ServiceContext.java:206)
        at com.eucalyptus.context.ServiceContext.send(ServiceContext.java:186)
        at com.eucalyptus.util.async.AsyncRequests$1.call(AsyncRequests.java:85)

Caused by: org.mule.component.ComponentException: Component that caused exception is: DefaultJavaComponent{EuareInternal.component}. Message payload is of type: GetRolePolicyType
        at org.mule.component.DefaultComponentLifecycleAdapter.invoke(DefaultComponentLifecycleAdapter.java:352)

        at org.mule.component.AbstractJavaComponent.doInvoke(AbstractJavaComponent.java:77)

A stack trace should not be logged when this occurs and we should probably not log this as an error.
fields.summary: Stack trace logged when accessing role policy that does not exist

comments.body: Moving 4.4.0 Issues from Release Pending to Resolved
